title: Info
description: Project options for a Project Forge application

org.description: the GitHub organization responsible for this project

authorID.description: the GitHub handle of the author of this project

authorName.description: the full name of the author of this project

authorEmail.description: the email address of the author of this project

team.description: the team that owns this project

license.description: the software license used by this project

homepage.description: the main web page for this project

sourcecode.description: the URL of this project's source repository

summary.description: a one-line summary of this project

description.description: a full multi-line description of this project

homebrew.description: override the URL to download Homebrew assets from

bundle.description: app bundle used in iOS and macOS applications

signingIdentity.description: keychain identity to use for signing binaries

slack.description: Slack webhook for notifying after successful releases

channels.description: various communication channels used by this project

javaPackage.description: the Java package used by the Android application

goVersion.description: the Go version used by this project

goBinary.description: the binary used for Go, defaults to "go"

type.description: the type of the value for this config variable

description.description: a plain-text description of this variable

extraFiles.description: additional files to include in the builds

ignoredFiles.description: files relative to this project that are ignored by code generation

deployments.description: files that track deployment of this app

envVars.description: additional environment variables used by this project

provider.description: the name of this document's provider

acronyms.description: custom acronyms intended to be displayed capitalized

moduleDefs.description: describes additional module to include in this project

key.description: name of this module, or "*" if a collection

path.description: relative path to the definition of this module

url.description: fallback URL to pull the module definition from
